title: New: Teen Daze – The Future
body:
With a UK tour just around the corner, Canadian dreampopper **Teen Daze** has dropped one of his finest tracks to date in the form of the beautiful _The Future_.

Combining his shoegaze inspirations with a healthy dose of 80’s electro-pop, the floaty vocals and sumptuous synths drift magically throughout the track. _The Future_ is taken from **Teen Daze’s** upcoming album _**All Of Us, Together**_, out 22 May, check out his tour dates below that.

04.06.12 – Stockholm, Sweden – Debaser Slussen  
RSVP: [https://www.facebook.com/events/361851397169162/](https://www.facebook.com/events/361851397169162/)
